  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class KafkaAvroReporter
extends KafkaReporter
    Kafka reporter for codahale metrics writing metrics in Avro format.

      • forRegistry

        @Deprecated
public static KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<? extends KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<?>> forRegistry(com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry registry)
        Deprecated. this method is bugged. Use KafkaAvroReporter.Factory.forRegistry(com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry) instead.
        Returns a new KafkaAvroReporter.Builder for KafkaAvroReporter. If the registry is of type MetricContext tags will NOT be inherited. To inherit tags, use forContext method.
        Parameters:
        registry - the registry to report
        Returns:
        KafkaAvroReporter builder
